V0107_01_00_00_0.text: Let me educate you on the fact that Duelists like you are a dime a dozen.

V0107_01_00_01_0.text:
Don't call me Mr. Crowler!
It's Dr. Crowler!

V0107_01_00_01_1.text: I'll teach you to respect my Ph.D. in Dueling!

V0107_01_00_02_1.text: I’ll fail this insolent little brat and send him home in no time!

V0107_03_00_01_0.text: You're trying hard, I'll give you that.

V0107_03_00_03_0.text: I'll give you a private lesson!

V0107_03_00_04_0.text: Not good... Not good at all!

V0107_03_00_05_0.text: Gulp... I mean, everything is going according to plan! Hahaha... ha...

V0107_05_00_00_0.text: Lesson #1: A Duelist must never give up, no matter how grim the outlook!

V0107_06_01_03_0.text: Nothing you do can fool me!

V0107_07_00_00_0.text:
Hmm, let's see...
From my hand...

V0107_07_09_01_0.text: I flip over my face-down card!

V0107_08_00_00_0.text:
My Continuous Spell activates!
Ancient Gear Castle!

V0107_08_00_01_0.text: The Equip Spell, Ancient Gear Tank!

V0107_08_00_02_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Ancient Gear Drill!

V0107_08_00_03_0.text: I activate my Equip Spell, Ancient Gear Fist!

V0107_08_00_04_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Ancient Gear Factory!

V0107_08_00_05_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Ancient Gear Explosive!

V0107_08_00_06_0.text:
My Trap Card activates!
Statue of the Wicked!

V0107_08_00_07_0.text: I activate my Trap Card, Zero Gravity!

V0107_08_00_08_0.text: I activate my Trap Card, Damage Condenser!

V0107_08_00_09_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Magnet Circle LV2!

V0107_08_00_11_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Polymerization!

V0107_08_00_12_0.text: I activate my Quick-Play Spell, Limiter Removal!

V0107_08_00_13_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Ancient Gear Workshop!

V0107_08_00_14_0.text:
I activate my Field Spell!
Geartown!

V0107_08_00_15_0.text: I activate my Continuous Spell, Ancient Gear Fortress!

V0107_08_00_16_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Ancient Gear Catapult!

V0107_08_00_17_0.text: The Continuous Trap, Ancient Gear Reborn!

V0107_09_00_00_0.text: Ultimate Ancient Gear Golem's effect activates!

V0107_09_00_04_0.text: Ancient Gear Golem - Ultimate Pound's effect activates!

V0107_09_00_05_0.text: Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Dragon's effect activates!

V0107_09_00_06_0.text: Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Chimera's effect activates!

V0107_09_00_09_0.text: Chaos Ancient Gear Giant's effect activates!

V0107_09_00_10_0.text: Ancient Gear Reactor Dragon's effect activates!

V0107_09_00_14_0.text: Ancient Gear Hunting Hound's effect activates!

V0107_10_00_00_0.text: Here's an example of proper Dueling technique.

V0107_11_00_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Attack Position!

V0107_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0107_13_00_00_0.text: I never expected to use this monster against a student!

V0107_13_00_00_1.text: Feel the wrath of Ultimate Ancient Gear Golem!

V0107_13_00_04_0.text:
Come on out!
Ancient Gear Golem - Ultimate Pound!

V0107_13_00_06_0.text: Here's my four-legged friend, Ancient Gear Beast!

V0107_13_00_08_0.text:
Tee hee hee hee!
Soar, Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Dragon!

V0107_13_00_09_0.text: Lay your eyes on Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Chimera!

V0107_13_00_11_0.text:
My Ancient Gear Golem...
Eh, whatever.

V0107_13_00_11_1.text: Because here comes Toon Ancient Gear Golem!

V0107_13_00_13_0.text: Join us, Chaos Ancient Gear Giant!

V0107_13_00_14_0.text: This dragon will shine for eternity!

V0107_13_00_15_0.text: I present to you... Ancient Gear Box!

V0107_13_00_16_0.text: Swoop to the field, Ancient Gear Wyvern!

V0107_13_00_17_0.text: Here's the machine of all machines!

V0107_13_00_18_0.text: Pounce on in, Ancient Gear Hunting Hound!

V0107_13_00_18_1.text: Who's a good pooch? You are! You are!

V0107_16_00_00_0.text: This is the end of your lesson!

V0107_18_00_00_0.text: I attack you directly with my monster!

V0107_19_00_00_0.text:
Prepare to be expelled!
Ultimate Ancient Gear Golem! Attack!

V0107_19_00_04_0.text: Ancient Gear Golem - Ultimate Pound attacks!

V0107_19_00_04_1.text:
Mechanized Melee Mayhem!
...That's a tongue twister.

V0107_19_00_06_0.text: Ancient Gear Beast, show 'em who's top dog!

V0107_19_00_08_0.text:
Take this!
Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Dragon attacks!

V0107_19_00_09_0.text: Go get 'em, Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Chimera!

V0107_19_00_10_0.text: Ancient Gear Cannon, lock and load!

V0107_19_00_11_1.text:
Attack with... I don't know...
Flaming Jab?

V0107_19_00_13_0.text:
Hee hee hee hee!
Chaos Ancient Gear Giant attacks!

V0107_19_00_14_0.text:
Eat this!
Attack, Ancient Gear Reactor Dragon!

V0107_19_00_16_0.text: Sink your fangs, Ancient Gear Wyvern!

V0107_28_00_00_0.text:
Humph!
You should've kept those moves in the classroom.

V0107_28_00_00_1.text: They don't work in the real world!

V0107_28_00_01_1.text:
I say your strategies were quite exemplary.
An impressive Duel on your part.

V0107_28_00_02_0.text: Ha! Nothing to it! The easiest Duel of my life!

V0107_28_00_02_1.text: (Phew. I can't believe I won. I almost had a heart attack!)

V0107_28_00_03_1.text: Your Duel gets the same grade as all your tests - an F minus!

V0107_29_00_00_1.text: How can this delinquent defeat me?

V0107_29_00_01_0.text: Students, I was simply teaching you how NOT to Duel.

V0107_29_00_01_1.text:
Do not perform any of the moves I made.
And that ends the lesson! Dismissed!

V0107_29_00_02_0.text:
Sniff... Leave me alone...
I don't want you to see me like this...

V0107_29_00_02_1.text: Was my nine years of studies to get my Dueling Ph.D. a waste?

V0107_29_00_03_0.text: Jaden, as a professor, I remember all my students.

V0107_29_00_03_1.text: But I especially won't forget you for being the slacker of all slackers.

V0107_30_00_00_0.text:
Tee hee hee hee!
Already lost the will to Duel?

V0107_30_00_01_0.text: Can't you take the hint that you're nothing but a slacker?

V0107_30_00_02_0.text: Now you know why I have a Ph.D. in Dueling!

V0107_33_00_00_0.text: Watch the skills of Duel Academy's leading professor in action!

V0107_33_00_01_0.text: Pay attention! Here's a special lesson!

V0107_34_00_01_0.text: Heh. I remember that move when I was still a naive rookie.

V0107_34_00_02_0.text: I have no time for slackers!

V0107_34_00_03_0.text: A great teacher is one that can learn from his students.

V0107_34_00_04_0.text:
No unnecessary chatter in the classroom or during a Duel!
Remember that!

V0107_34_00_06_0.text: Shadow Games are no part of a well-rounded education!

V0107_34_00_07_0.text: I may be hard on them, but I see potential in all my students!

V0107_34_00_09_0.text: You mustn’t speak out of turn, young scholar!
